item.title: Informs that responsibility for Non-Power Reactor insp program has been transferred from NRR.All related repts, correspondence & inquires w/docket number specified should be directed to listed address.
item.author: NRC (Affiliation Not Assigned)

item.title: Forwards revised NRC Form 398,personal qualifications statement-licensee & NRC Form 396,certification of medical exam by facility licensee.Forms revised to reflect changes to 10CFR55 effective on 870526.W/o encls.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO UTILITY, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE

item.title: Informs of NRC relocation to stated address.Mailing address unchanged.A Adams project manager & TS Michaels back-up project manager.

item.title: Generic Ltr 80-38 to all nonpower reactor licensees re NPR physical protection requirements.Summary of certain NPR physical protection requirements encl & should aid in determining safeguards requirements applicable to facility.
